inputs.name: customArguments
inputs.label: Custom Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: The custom JReleaser command to execute.

inputs.name: initFormat
inputs.label: Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: Configuration file format. Currently supported formats are: yml, json, and toml.

inputs.name: configFile
inputs.label: Config file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the JReleaser config file. The default value is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)/jreleaser.yml
inputs.visibleRule: command != env || command != template || command != json-schema || command != init, || command != templateGenerate

inputs.name: strict
inputs.label: Strict
inputs.visibleRule: command != env || command != template || command != json-schema || command != init, || command != templateGenerate

inputs.name: gitRootSearch
inputs.label: Git root search
inputs.visibleRule: command != env || command != template || command != json-schema || command != init, || command != templateGenerate

inputs.name: selectCurrentPlatform
inputs.label: Select current platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Activates paths matching the current platform.
inputs.visibleRule: command != env || command != template || command != json-schema || command != init, || command != templateGenerate || command != announce || command != changelog || command != deploy || command != download

inputs.name: selectPlatform
inputs.label: Select platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Activates paths matching the given platform. separate multiple platforms with a comma.
inputs.visibleRule: command != env || command != template || command != json-schema || command != init, || command != templateGenerate || command != announce || command != changelog || command != deploy || command != download

inputs.name: rejectPlatform
inputs.label: Reject platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Activates paths not matching the given platform. separate multiple platforms with a comma.
inputs.visibleRule: command != env || command != template || command != json-schema || command != init, || command != templateGenerate || command != announce || command != changelog || command != deploy || command != download

inputs.name: baseDirectory
inputs.label: Base directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory containing the JReleaser config file. The default value is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)

inputs.name: logLevel
inputs.label: Log level
inputs.helpMarkDown: Log level. Valid values are: debug, info, warn and quiet.
inputs.visibleRule: command != env || command != template || command != json-schema

inputs.name: dryRun
inputs.label: dryrun
inputs.visibleRule: command = announce || command = changelog || command = deploy
